data.comment: The match has started, with Derby County kicking-off.
Alex Pattison is replacing Curtis Thompson for the away team.
In the minute 31, Wycombe's Scott Kashket has been booked in Derby.
Duane Holmes puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Jeremy Simpson blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Wycombe with the kick-off.
Matt Bloomfield is replacing Anis Mehmeti for Wycombe at Pride Park Stadium.
The away team have replaced Scott Kashket with Adebayo Akinfenwa. This is the third substitution made today by Gareth Ainsworth.
In the minute 65, Martyn Waghorn is on a sub for Kazim for Derby County.
Liam Rosenior is making the team's second substitution at Pride Park Stadium with Jason Knight replacing Duane Holmes.
Gareth Ainsworth (Wycombe) is making a fourth substitution, with Fred Onyedinma replacing Dennis Adeniran.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Louie Sibley with Kamil Jozwiak.
Goal! Matt Bloomfield equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
The match has come to a close in Derby. The final score is 1-1.
Derby County make their fourth substitution with Jack Kirk Stretton replacing George Evans.
Wycombe make their fifth substitution with David Wheeler replacing Daryl Horgan.
